name: Baldi Clicker (Baldi's Basics Fan-Game)
description:
The Baldi Clicker Public Demo has now been released!

After some days in the works, Baldi Clicker's Public Demo is now out! It's basically a Cookie Clicker simulator but Baldi themed, try it out and give it a go.

Everything seen in the game is subject to change in the future. such as...

  • Visuals
  • Sounds
  • Gameplay
  • AND MORE!

So try out the demo for this game and see how you feel aboot it.

(Note: Your progress in the game does not save, this is a really early demo so that's your answer to why.)
